Note : Dear valued customer, if you cancel the booking before OTP confirmation to the property manager you will get 100% Rent amount (Excluding payment gateway charges) and you will claim only 25% of your security deposited amount.
Guests must update their availability on daily basis through Joy stays app, based on the guest availability the food proceedings will be taken place.
While Check-in guest must carry their original Identity proof (Aadhar, driving license, Passport and Voter ID etc) except Pan card.
Smoking & Alcohol consumption or any other illegal and In disciplinary activities are not encouraged inside the premises and strictly Prohibited.
If guest damages any owner’s property, then they will be penalized for the same.
Property management is not responsible for your valuables.
Refundable amount will be credited or will be issued as per refund policies.
In case if guest’s check-out without any prior intimation or without paying rent, then legal actions will be taken as per management norms.
Without intimation to the property managers, guests’ neighbors & friends are not allowed to stay inside the premises.
Guests should pay the rent on or before 05th of every month, if it is delayed additional amount will be added as a penalty with respective to the month.
One-time maintenance charge will be collected at the time of check out.
• Guest must update tomorrow’s availability through joystays app to prepare food without intimation guest may not have a right to ask if the food will be completed.
• Dear guest while check-in carry your original identity proof except pan card which you uploaded at the time of booking.
• Smoking and consumption of Alcohol, Birthday party’s drinks in the property premises is strictly prohibited.
• If guest damage anything inside the premises amount will be collected from guest only. • Property management is not responsible for your valuables.
• Refundable amount will be credited or will be issued as per refund policies.
